import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; import { addsalontoDB } from "../../actions/salonAction"; export class signup extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.addsalon({ name: "Beatué espace", street: "Rue Riagana", city: "Ariana", imgs: ["ddddddddd", "rrrrrrrrrrr"], worktime: { Monday: "09:00-17:00", Thuesday: "09:00-17:00", Sunday: "09:00-17:00", }, email: "beatué@gmail.com", phone: 25144758, password: "daliooe", description: "dfghjklmdfghjkldfghjklrftgyhujikoldfghjklcdxfhjkdslmfdslhkgfsdhkljfjdslkgfjsdkhfdshkjflfdsgfjkhdsljfdskgjfkhljdsfgjdhsfkgj", }); } render() { return (

While it may not be obvious to everyone, there are a number of reasons creating random paragraphs can be useful. A few examples of how some people use this generator are listed in the following paragraphs.

votre emploi de temps de travail

Créer mon compte

Annuler Créer mon compte
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({}); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ addsalon: (salon) => dispatch(addsalontoDB(salon)), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(signup);
